title: Metal Gear Solid 3 Remaster from Konami?! - Kinda Funny Games Daily 10.01.21
description:
Greg and Janet welcome Spooky Season by talking about Konami's return to AAA games with rumors of Metal Gear Solid, Castlevania, and more!

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:10:00 - Housekeeping
Blessing Show
Will Wright
NEXT WEEK, Blessing and Andy are taking part in Panda's All Star Nickvitational; a HUGE Nickelodeon All Star Brawl tournament featuring a bunch of big YouTubers and streamers like Ovilee, Moist Critikal, Ludwig, and more. It's all to raise charity for The Breast Cancer Research Foundation.
Andy and Bless need YOUR help. Competitors in the tournament and their communities have 1 week to raise money to bid on their favorite character. That's based on the money you donate. Right now you can go to kindafunny.com/bless and kindafunny.com/andy to donate so the guys can bid on the character of their choice. And remember that money all goes to The Breast Cancer Research Foundation.
The tournament is happening on Tuesday, October 5th at noon PT on Twitch.tv/pandaglobal.
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Pranksy & Black Jack
The Roper Report   -
00:12:20 - Metal Gear Solid 3 Remake?! Castlevania?! Konami Returns?! Andy Robinson @ VGC
00:24:35 - But Let’s Not Get Too Excited, Remember, this is Konami… Eddie @ GameSpot
00:32:50 - New World on Launch, Servers, and More
00:38:30 -  Ad  
00:43:50 - Xbox Goes Big with Accessibility 
00:50:50 - Blake Jorgensen is leaving EA, Eddie @ GameSpot
00:51:20 - Bloober Team is Busy
00:56:40 - Bandai Namco is getting a new Logo
00:58:00 - Out today
00:59:00 - You‘re Wrong
Next  Week’s Hosts:
MON: Bless and Tim
TUE: Greg and Tam
WED: Bless and Andy
THURS: Greg and Tim
FRI: Greg and Blessing
itunes:author: Kinda Funny
